articles.content:
The White House is confirming that Canada has indeed asked the United States for help in procuring COVID-19 vaccine doses.
But press secretary Jen Psaki would only say they are considering the reque… [+821 chars]
articles.description: Psaki is repeating what she's been saying for weeks: that President Joe Biden's priority is to ensure every American is vaccinated first.
articles.title: Canada has asked U.S. for COVID-19 vaccine help, White House confirms - Global News

articles.content:
American Magic skipper Terry Hutchinson says while it was bittersweet having to watch from the sidelines yesterday as the Kiwis won the Americas Cup, he had nothing but praise for Team New Zealand.
… [+1598 chars]

articles.title: American skipper admits team has ‘mountain’ of work ahead to reach Team NZ’s level, piles praise on Burling - TVNZ

articles.content: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, R-Ky., said on Wednesday that Democrats were not given a "mandate" by the American people to eliminate the filibuster in order to completely "transform" this c… [+2011 chars]
articles.description: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, R-Ky., said on Wednesday that Democrats were not given a "mandate" by the American people to eliminate the filibuster in order to completely "transform" this country.
articles.title: McConnell on 'Faulkner Focus': Dems do not have mandate to 'completely transform' the country - Fox News

articles.content:
In June 2021 Marvel Comics will launch a five-part limited edition series titled The United States of Captain America.
 That timing is deliberate as June is Pride Month, and the edition of the chara… [+2548 chars]
articles.description: In a five-part limited edition series set to launch its first issue during Pride Month (June), Marvel will debut a Captain America who is a gay teen.
articles.title: Marvel Comics announces gay teen Captain America as part of new series - Stuff.co.nz

articles.content:
Team New Zealand have lifted the America's Cup this afternoon after defeating Luna Rossa 7-3 in Auckland.

articles.content:
Team New Zealand have done the impossible, overturning a huge 2km deficit to charge home and take a 5-3 lead in the Americas Cup.
Your playlist will load after this ad

articles.description: The Kiwis were nearly an entire leg behind, but never gave up and took the lead after the Italians floundered.
articles.title: Spectacular comeback from Team NZ against Luna Rossa puts America's Cup within their grasp - TVNZ
